targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(DISTINCT log.user_id) as 'Learners (#)',
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  count(cont.parent_id) / count(DISTINCT log.user_id) as 'Events / People',
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval),
  log.page_no as 次數
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name)
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  count(cont.parent_id) / count(DISTINCT log.user_id),
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and log.operation_name = 'ADD BOOKMARK' and 
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval),
  log.page_no as 次數
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date) and operation_name = 'ADD BOOKMARK' and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name)
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  count(cont.parent_id) / count(DISTINCT log.user_id),
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and log.operation_name = 'NOTGETIT' and 
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval),
  log.page_no as 次數
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date) and operation_name = 'NOTGETIT' and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name)
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

panels.title: NOT GET IT 頁數統計

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(cont.parent_id) / count(DISTINCT log.user_id),
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name)  and log.marker_color = 'rgb(255,0,0)' and log.operation_name = 'ADD MARKER' and 
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test' and log.marker_text != ''

SELECT
  count(cont.parent_id) / count(DISTINCT log.user_id),
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name)  and log.marker_color = 'rgb(255,255,0)' and log.operation_name = 'ADD MARKER' and 
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test' and log.marker_text != ''

SELECT
  log.operation_date,
  muser.username,
  log.user_id,
  log.page_no,
  log.marker_text as marker_text

FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir, mdl_user as muser
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date) and operation_name = 'ADD MARKER' and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and log.marker_color = 'rgb(255,0,0)'
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'
  and substring_index(log.user_id, '@', 1) = muser.id and log.marker_text != '';

SELECT
  log.operation_date,
  muser.username,
  log.user_id,
  log.page_no,
  log.marker_text as marker_text

FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir, mdl_user as muser
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date) and operation_name = 'ADD MARKER' and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and log.marker_color = 'rgb(255,255,0)'
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test' and log.marker_text != ''
  and substring_index(log.user_id, '@', 1) = muser.id;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval),
  log.page_no as 次數
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date) and operation_name = 'ADD MARKER' and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) 
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  count(cont.parent_id) / count(DISTINCT log.user_id),
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and log.operation_name = 'ADD MEMO' and 
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test' and log.memo_text != ""

SELECT
  count(cont.parent_id) / count(DISTINCT log.user_id),
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and log.operation_name = 'ADD_HW_MEMO' and 
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  log.operation_date,
  muser.username,
  log.user_id,
  log.page_no,
  REPLACE(log.memo_text, ';:::nl:::;', ' ') as memo_text
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir, mdl_user as muser
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date) and operation_name = 'ADD MEMO' and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name)
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test' and log.memo_text != ""
  and substring_index(log.user_id, '@', 1) = muser.id;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval),
  log.page_no as 次數
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date) and operation_name = 'ADD MEMO' and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name)
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval),
  sum(count(cont.parent_id)) over(ORDER BY log.operation_date) as 'Cumulative Sum'
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date)  and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name) and
  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'
  
group by 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(log.operation_date,$__interval),
  muser.username as metric,
  count(DISTINCT log.page_no)
FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir, mdl_user as muser
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(operation_date) and log.contents_name IN ($contents_name)
  and cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test'
  and substring_index(log.user_id, '@', 1) = muser.id
  
group by muser.username;

list.definition: SELECT distinct (cont.title)  FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir   WHERE  (cont.del_flag = 0) and  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test' ;
list.label: contents_name
list.name: contents_name
list.query: SELECT distinct (cont.title)  FROM br_event_log as log, br_contents as cont, br_contents_directory as dir   WHERE  (cont.del_flag = 0) and  cont.parent_id = dir.directory_id and cont.contents_id = log.contents_id and dir.name = '$flask_test' ;
